suite.name: eBox egroupware Test Suite
suite.desc: Contains tests for login and mail sending.

test.name: EnableModules
test.desc: Enables network, webserver, users, mail and egroupware modules and saves changes.

test.name: AddUser
test.desc: Adds an user through the ebox web interface and checks if addedd correctly in LDAP database

test.name: CheckUser
test.desc: Checks if the user is added correctly on LDAP

test.name: SetAdminTemplate
test.desc: Creates an admin permissions template an assign it to the created user.

test.name: EgwAdminLogin
test.desc: Login with the same user that is now an admin.

test.name: ConfigMail
test.desc: Configure mail vdomain and try to send/receive a mail from inside egroupware.

test.name: TestMail
test.desc: Configure mail vdomain and try to send/receive a mail from inside egroupware.
